thread.title: Perfect boutique hotel with great staff
thread.title_full: Perfect boutique hotel with great staff - Review of Hotel 32 32, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Christopher G
title: Perfect boutique hotel with great staff
text: I stayed at Hotel 32/32 while my partner and I were there for a surgery operation he was having. The staff was nothing but pleasant, friendly, and accommodating our entire stay. The full kitchen in the King suite was also a convenient amenity. This was truly one of the best hotel stays in NYC. Will be back!
